long_desc.thetext:
Created an attachment (id=1429) modernize configure.ac
Hello,
cyrus-imap 2.4 uses outdated form of AC_INIT. With the new form, the name and version of the package can be given as parameters of AC_INIT(). I have moved the definitions of PACKAGE and VERSION from /Makefile.in to /configure.in:AC_INIT .
The further, autoconf makes sure, that the correct _CYRUS_VERSION is in the config.h file. I have removed from /Makefile.in the code for putting "#define _CYRUS_VERSION" in xversion.h .
configure.in defined IMAP_COM_ERR_LIBS and COM_ERR_LIBS in the same say. I have replaced everywhere in the package IMAP_COM_ERR_LIBS with COM_ERR_LIBS, and removed the reference to IMAP_COM_ERR_LIBS from configure.in .
In configure.in I improved a little bit the output of some commands (putting the default values between [ and ], shifting text to the right, to justify with the other lines of ./configure --help).
master/cyrusMasterMIB.c had included 2x config.h
master/masterconf.c #include "libconfig.C" instead of "libconfig.H".
Please, after applying the patch, rename configure.in to configure.ac, as recommended by the current Autoconf manual.
Със здраве Дилян

Created an attachment (id=1433) Adds AS_HELP_STRING to configure.ac, removes libcom from master/Makefile.in
\modernize_autoconf_2.patch includes all the changes in \modernize_autoconf.patch and adds:
applies on every invocation of AC_ARG_WITH and AC_ARG_ENABLE the AS_HELP_STRING macro
replaces for consistency everywhere --with-...=PATH and --with-...=dir with --with-...=DIR .
removes in master/Makefile.in the references to COM_ERR_, as the master-process does not depend on libcom_err.

Dilyan,
would it be easier if you had a location to push out a GIT repository out to? We can offer this if you need/want.
I fixed this on the master branch.

attachment.desc: Adds AS_HELP_STRING to configure.ac, removes libcom from master/Makefile.in
